name: sample_eval_set
description: Sample evaluation set for testing agent performance

test_cases.name: simple_question
test_cases.description: Test agent's ability to answer simple factual questions

turns.user_content: What is the capital of France?
turns.expected_final_response: The capital of France is Paris.

test_cases.name: tool_usage
test_cases.description: Test agent's ability to use tools correctly

turns.user_content: Search for information about artificial intelligence
expected_intermediate_responses: I'll search for information about artificial intelligence.
turns.expected_final_response: Artificial intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems.

test_cases.name: multi_turn_conversation
test_cases.description: Test agent's ability to maintain context across turns

turns.expected_final_response: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.

turns.user_content: Can you give me an example?
turns.expected_final_response: A common example of machine learning is email spam filtering, where the system learns to identify spam emails based on patterns in the data.
